localTime.title: Local time
localTime.description: The local time using RFC3339 with a stated time zone offset such as "2001-07-04T12:08:56-07:00". An example formatting pattern is "yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ssXXX".

localTimezoneOffset.title: Local time zone offset
localTimezoneOffset.description: The current, local time zone offset in minutes from UTC for the localTime in this object.  This will include the current DST offset if applicable.

geo.title: Geo
geo.description: The geographic location where the experience was delivered.

POIinteraction.title: POI interaction
POIinteraction.description: The point of interest (POI) interaction details.

activePOIs.title: POI detail
activePOIs.description: Details of the points of interest (POIs) that cause the event.
